category.name: Product Structure.Appearance Configuration Background
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: APPR_background_updater_max_num_heartbeats
preference.preference_description: Deprecated. How many heartbeat records to keep per machine. A heartbeat record is simply a note made by the background appearance updater to show that it has run; this serves as a way to find out from the database whether such updaters are running as intended.
